website_summaries.verdict: On its 34th iteration, the Nike Air Zoom Pegasus has kept most of the features of the previous version, only updating the features of the upper. Like its predecessors, the Pegasus 34 has a level of durability and comfort that provides an incredible support and allows great foot control. This version still employs the signature cushioning of the Pegasus line, which is great for road-running. With most users commending its improved flexibility and breathability, the Pegasus 34 is designed to impress neutral runners undertaking tough roads.
pros: A majority of the users commented that the Pegasus 34 is extremely comfortable
A lot of buyers have observed that the shoe is lightweight yet durable
Some mentioned that the shoe is good to go right out of the box, and that did not require breaking in
The Pegasus 34’s responsive nature was also commended by many of its testers
With numerous color choices, many users found the Pegasus 34 to be stylish
There were several opinions on how the shoe fits: a lot of users mentioned it is true to size, and others were impressed with the more focused fit and the support it provides
The shoe gives a smooth ride and it feels fast, according to some
One user said the Pegasus 34 reduced their knee and calf discomforts
Even more breathable than the previous version, as noticed by numerous runners
The shoe allows for great foot control with its awesome traction, based on the observation of one user
cons: Some runners mentioned that the Pegasus 34 has irregular padding and puts uneven pressure on their foot
More than a handful of users commented that the laces were difficult to adjust, and another said they caused some discomfort on the top of his foot
A couple of users said that the Pegasus 34 had poor durability and that it had the tendency to break apart quickly
There were some buyers who were not impressed by the cushioning of the Pegasus 34

customer_reviews.title: Decent running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great running shoes, and pretty fast I did both my 5km and half marathon PB in them at 34 years of age. They are fairly light and quick but less cushioning on very long runs. After about 550km a part of the tread at the back and bottom of the heel has come off one of them, but perhaps this is reasonable wear and it is not enough to notice when running. They only lose a star because other decent shoes are more competitively priced. But I would buy these again and likely will have more zoom pegasus in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Liam

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, stylish, just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I do running and sprinting, I decided to get a proper pair of trainers and pay a bit extra. These ones are good for concrete (no shin splints or aches in the feet with the tough surface) as they've quite a padded sole. But they work great too on astro turf, nice grip. They're so comfortable and stylish I wear them just when going places.
customer_reviews.author: B. white

customer_reviews.title: Light and don’t get a hole in the upper
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying Asics GT for the past 5 years for treadmill running. I was told I had a pronator gait (through video evidence) but turns out I am neutral. Changed to Pegasus and they are so much lighter and supportive. Previous Asics GT got holes in the big toe upper too easily. These haven’t after approx 200km. UPDATE Completed 600k on a treadmill and the trainers still look almost new. Support remains great.
customer_reviews.author: siggysuper

customer_reviews.title: Too stiff; the black color is actually BLUE
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why, but I just don't like these. After two months, I feel like they're too stiff. An improvement on the "roll bar" of the 33's, but still nowhere near as good or as comfortable as the 32's. Goods: the cushioning is exceptional Bads: just too stiff, especially in the heel. Feels like a wider shoe than previous. Just can't get comfortable in them. Color: Also, the black color is actually blue beneath the mesh... the description doesn't mention that. It looks navy, not black. Odd.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t appreciate these were being shipped over from Germany, but that said, am pleased with these. Provide adequate cushioning when out running on the roads. Are holding up really well against the elements. Generally I go on runs of about 2 miles once a week. Suit that purpose really well. With the many many different running shoe available from Amazon, I’ve managed to pick a good one!
customer_reviews.author: Nicky Jenkin - njenkin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent durable trainer suitable for neutral heavy people
customer_reviews.text: This is the 5th pair of Nike AirPegasus that I have bought. Excellent durable trainer suitable for neutral heavy people. The fit is slightly snug compared with previous versions. Only complaint is that the laces do not stay tied, as Nike have reverted to a thin flat stretchy lace that does not grip itself. The best laces were in the 28 version, which were round, thicker and grippy. See photo showing previous AP28 lace in yellow, and the new AP34 lace in black.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, comfortable, supportive, well made and light.
customer_reviews.text: I have ran in ASICS for over 3 years but after being disappointed with the last pair thought I would try these. The ASICS and these are about the same price and these are miles better. Lighter, more comfortable, better fit and I do not think they have the ASICS issue of your toe punching a hole in the top. I would certainly buy another pair. Used for 5-10k outside and 5k on running machines.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Jon Forster

customer_reviews.title: Very less cushioning
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure how good a running shoe this is - especially for long distances, given the minuscule amount of cushioning and support compared to my last Asics Nimbus. Apart from minimal cushioning, the shoe looks well built.
customer_reviews.author: TopTip

customer_reviews.title: Still as good as ever
customer_reviews.text: I've had Nike Pegasus for many years running 4 of my 6 marathons in them plus a few triathlons. My running days are now over but, despite the many tweaks, they are still as comfortable as ever.
customer_reviews.author: Jiff

customer_reviews.title: I prefered the Pegasus I bought in 2012
customer_reviews.text: I have not liked this version of the Pegasus 34. A prior version I bought in 2012 were far more comfortable and grippy. The laces on this model are absolutely AWFUL too. I have regularly found that they come undone - the first I have ever experienced with any running shoe. I have used them as daily wear / glorified slippers to be frank. That is about it!
customer_reviews.author: Mr R K Seth

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe; light and robust
customer_reviews.text: These are comfy, very light, but pretty robust. Stand up to rain fairly well. A bit of discomfort in the arch of my left foot that I've never experienced with other shoes before but worth it for the weight and tread.
customer_reviews.author: Cmartin90

customer_reviews.title: My favourite Nike shoe
customer_reviews.text: Struggle to find these shoes which I like to race in so delighted to buy them. Arrived ahead of schedule, perfect & fairly good vfm.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Corcoran's prodigy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Another present purchased and my friend was delighted. He runs 20k a day and these are perfect in size and comfort
customer_reviews.author: CiaraDub9

customer_reviews.title: Great, comfy running shoe with great support.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent running shoes. I can’t fault them I just prefer a slightly less chunky sole but that’s my preference these are brilliant. Have ran over 100 miles and wear almost daily and they still hold up well. Wear on the sole now but I’ve had them over a year. You’ll be happy you bought them. Super comfy too.
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: well made and last a good while in spite of the abuse they get
customer_reviews.text: Both my boys run competitively and do much of their training in these. They are light, well made and last a good while in spite of the abuse they get. Probably about the sixth pair I've bought. Who says running's a cheap sport?
customer_reviews.author: randg penrose

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fine. Bought as a replacenment for Pegasus 34. Think the previous version looked better. The runners are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Customer K

customer_reviews.title: A comfortable and fast running shoe
customer_reviews.text: A comfortable and fast running shoe that didn't take long to run in and get comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: B. Lawson

customer_reviews.title: New runner completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: New to running so my critique is pretty basic. They fit well, are breathable, minimise the shock on my knees, and don't give me blisters. All in all I'm a satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, I have slightly a little wider foot
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, I have slightly a little wider foot, sometimes 8.5 sometimes 9 and these 9's are really comfortable and perfect.
customer_reviews.author: AJ C. Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great to be running in Nike Pegasus again after trying other running shoes. Great quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Crouch

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t sure but ......
customer_reviews.text: Never been a Nike fan! EVER! But these are brilliant,totally changed my mind about the make,good support where needed as a novice runner
customer_reviews.author: Pete chapman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and speedy delivery Bought these before and was so impressed bought some more
customer_reviews.author: pitibev

customer_reviews.title: ... replacements for a worn out pair which gave me great service over many years
customer_reviews.text: Bought them as replacements for a worn out pair which gave me great service over many years. Didn't even consider looking at any other alternatives than Nike/Pegasus, Manufacturer/Style because I fully expect to get the same excellent performance from them.
customer_reviews.author: P.h.

customer_reviews.title: Sizes are on small side
customer_reviews.text: Sizes are small in UK fitting I usually am size 10 but needed 10.5
customer_reviews.author: Nick Troth

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these running shoes for fitness. I run 2-3 times per week and these trainers are nice and comfortable. I’m really impressed with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I still find the Nike Pegasus a great running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Despite slight modifications over the years, I still find the Nike Pegasus a great running shoe, especially for a heavier runner like myself.
customer_reviews.author: Juggler234

customer_reviews.title: Superb shoes
customer_reviews.text: Best running shoes I've had till date. Comfortable on all fronts and great to run in.
customer_reviews.author: Aditya Mandrekar

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I really love these shoes, wear them all the time. I was disappointed that they looked much more blue in the light than they do in the picture. I was expecting them to be black.
customer_reviews.author: C. Pedersen

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, using for work as I walk fairly large distances over the entire day. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Kieran Holley

customer_reviews.title: size matters
customer_reviews.text: always important to buy running shoes half a size larger than normal walking shoes, therefore these are a perfect fit
customer_reviews.author: D. H. Meakin

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Great colour (classy) and quality product. Delivered safely and swiftly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery no problems
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery from purchase. Would recommend seller. Happy enough with product
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Ran 10k personal best Sunday. Nice
customer_reviews.text: Arrived Wednesday, tried them Friday. Ran 10k personal best Sunday. Nice, light and good cushioning as you hit the ground.
customer_reviews.author: ADRIAN THOMPSON

customer_reviews.title: Better than the 35s!!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, solid feel, better built than the Pegasus 35’s. Much prefer the heel of these 34’s.
customer_reviews.author: rob l.

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and a good fit. Not used for long so don't know how fast they wear out. Good value for money as far as I can tell.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and good design
customer_reviews.text: I like the design and you can feel a change in terms of how soft it is to walk and run wearing them
customer_reviews.author: Lluna

customer_reviews.title: Far superior than model 35
customer_reviews.text: I had a model 35 and decided to go back to 34 as the new one is an inferior product.
customer_reviews.author: An user

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Use this trainer all the time , fitted perfectly and delivered in 1 day
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Yet to be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My 5th pair.......as reliably comfortable and suitable for treadmill, road and off-road use as ever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but really comfortable. Best running trainers I have ever worn
customer_reviews.text: Slightly Bigger than expected, but really comfortable. Best running trainers I have ever worn!!
customer_reviews.author: Mr Ally Setchfield

customer_reviews.title: The only running shoes I will recommend. Excellent comfort on long runs and a great ...
customer_reviews.text: The only running shoes I will recommend. Excellent comfort on long runs and a great fit. Cushioning is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Vince Taylor

customer_reviews.title: great price and arrived quickly
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I had hoped for, great price and arrived quickly! Would thoroughly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Same fit year on year
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using Nike air Pegasus since 1998 from 5k up to marathon and have always liked the feel of them
customer_reviews.author: Cs

customer_reviews.title: Industry standard.
customer_reviews.text: Industry standard have had Pegasus for years and will continue to use them. Not too much padding and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: pargi1988

product_meta.title: Nike Men's Air Zoom Pegasus 34 Running Shoes
product_meta.description: The Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 34 Running Shoe Mens offers a perfect fit and responsive cushioning that will help you increase your pace and focus on speed. The Nike Zoom Air units in the heel and forefoot ensure a soft, responsive and elastic ride. The uniform fit with engineered mesh ensures maximum breathability while Flywire's ultra-light and extremely robust cables provide incredible support. The heel is designed to support your natural freedom of movement while the sole works to absorb shock and ensure maximum impact cushioning for soft and smooth transitions.
